verses.verse: But <WG1161> the Spirit <WG4151> saith <WG3004> expressly <WG4490>, that <WG3754> in <WG1722> later <WG5306> times <WG2540> some <WG5100> shall fall away from <WG868> the faith <WG4102>, giving heed to <WG4337> seducing <WG4108> spirits <WG4151> and <WG2532> doctrines <WG1319> of demons <WG1140>,
through <WG1722> the hypocrisy <WG5272> of men that speak lies <WG5573>, branded <WG2743> in their <WG2398> own conscience <WG4893> as with a hot iron <WG2743>;

forbidding <WG2967> to marry <WG1060>, and commanding to abstain from <WG567> meats <WG1033>, which <WG3739> God <WG2316> created <WG2936> to <WG1519> be received <WG3336> with <WG3326> thanksgiving <WG2169> by them that believe <WG4103> and <WG2532> know <WG1921> the truth <WG225>.

For <WG3754> every <WG3956> creature <WG2938> of God <WG2316> is good <WG2570>, and <WG2532> nothing <WG3762> is to be rejected <WG579>, if it be received <WG2983> with <WG3326> thanksgiving <WG2169>:
for <WG1063> it is sanctified <WG37> through <WG1223> the word <WG3056> of God <WG2316> and <WG2532> prayer <WG1783>.

If thou put <WG5294> the brethren <WG80> in mind of <WG5294> these things <WG5023>, thou shalt be <WG2071> a good <WG2570> minister <WG1249> of Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424>, nourished in <WG1789> the words <WG3056> of the faith <WG4102>, and <WG2532> of the good <WG2570> doctrine <WG1319> which thou hast <WG3739> followed until now <WG3877>:
but <WG1161> refuse <WG3868> profane <WG952> and <WG2532> old wives <WG1126>' fables <WG3454>. And <WG1161> exercise <WG1128> thyself <WG4572> unto <WG4314> godliness <WG2150>:

for <WG1063> bodily <WG4984> exercise <WG1129> is <WG2076> profitable <WG5624> for a little <WG3641>; but <WG1161> godliness <WG2150> is <WG2076> profitable <WG5624> for all things <WG3956>, having <WG2192> promise <WG1860> of the life <WG2222> which now is <WG3568>, and <WG2532> of that which is to come <WG3195>.
Faithful <WG4103> is the <WG3588> saying <WG3056>, and <WG2532> worthy <WG514> of all <WG3956> acceptation <WG594>.

For <WG1063> to this end <WG5124> we <WG2872> labor <WG2872> and <WG2532> strive <WG3679>, because <WG3754> we <WG2872> have our hope <WG1679> set on <WG1909> the living <WG2198> God <WG2316>, who <WG3739> is <WG2076> the Saviour <WG4990> of all <WG3956> men <WG444>, specially <WG3122> of them that believe <WG4103>.

Let <WG2706> no man <WG3367> despise <WG2706> thy <WG4675> youth <WG3503>; but <WG235> be thou <WG1096> an ensample <WG5179> to them that believe <WG4103>, in <WG1722> word <WG3056>, in <WG1722> manner <WG391> of life <WG1722>, in love <WG26>, in <WG1722> faith <WG4102>, in <WG1722> purity <WG47>.
Till <WG2193> I come <WG2064>, give heed <WG4337> to reading <WG320>, to exhortation <WG3874>, to teaching <WG1319>.

Neglect <WG272> not <WG3361> the gift <WG5486> that is in <WG1722> thee <WG4671>, which <WG3739> was given <WG1325> thee <WG4671> by <WG1223> prophecy <WG4394>, with <WG3326> the laying on <WG1936> of the hands <WG5495> of the presbytery <WG4244>.

Be diligent <WG3191> in these things <WG5023>; give thyself wholly <WG2468> to <WG1722> them <WG5125>; that <WG2443> thy <WG4675> progress <WG4297> may <WG5600> be manifest <WG5318> unto <WG1722> all <WG3956>.

Take heed to <WG1907> thyself <WG4572>, and <WG2532> to thy teaching <WG1319>. Continue in <WG1961> these things <WG846>; for <WG1063> in doing <WG4160> this <WG5124> thou shalt <WG4982> save <WG4982> both <WG2532> thyself <WG4572> and <WG2532> them that hear <WG191> thee <WG4675>.
